title: Starting a new account and i think it's kind of weird how the new rune system works.
body:
So I've started a new account because I'm a paranoid wog thinks this account is cursed and i can only get the bottom of the barrel in my games,


but i do think locking certain runes seems a little miss leading and or not as fun as it could be.

Like i think it said "rune pages locked until lvl 11" then when i played bot up until then i thought sweet gunna make my own pages NOPE now you're able to just read through the runes and not even change a couple. 

I just think like for a new player playing someone like tryndamere they should'nt be limited to PTA or grasp when a trynd main would've used conquer into like malph or ornn or like anyone.

I'm just saying i feel you're limited with a lot of champs for no reason like kled, trynd, riven, mord, and every bruiser/tank support (leona, alistar and so on). there should be like 2 key stone in each tree available a lot sooner. 

these are my thoughts anyway

replies.body: its designed to help new players that dont know what they are doing build/rune wise. they are the best generic runes for new players. you dont want someones first 2 weeks of league being predator pantheon top lane.
